radiographic_examinations.findings: Minimal dependent atelectasis within the lung bases, 2 mm nodule in the right lower lobe, small bilateral pleural effusions, splenomegaly (16.2 cm), abnormally dilated and thickened appendix (1.6 cm), small intramural abscess (0.9 x 0.9 x 1.1 cm) at appendiceal base, reactive cecal and terminal ileal thickening, small left fat-containing inguinal hernia.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: The tiny hypodensity in the right lower renal pole measuring 4 mm is likely an AML and stable compared to prior studies.
